member.name: F:MCopy.CopyFiles.fArray
member.summary: fArray is the Source files with full path.

member.name: F:MCopy.CopyFiles.fArrayDest
member.summary: fArrayDest is the Destination Directory path.

member.name: M:MCopy.CopyFiles.FillSourceArray(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method uses Recursion to fill fArray with Source Directory and file full Path
member.param: Source Directory, passed in as args[0] for class start
Destination Directory, passed in as args[1] for class start

member.name: M:MCopy.CopyFiles.FillDestArray(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method uses Recursion to fill fArrayDest with Destination Directory full Path to perserve path information when coping files
member.param: Source Directory, passed in as args[0] for class start
Destination Directory, passed in as args[1] for class start

member.name: M:MCopy.CopyFiles.CopyOne
member.summary: This method takes the first 1/4 of fArray and fArrayDest and uses them to copy files.

member.name: M:MCopy.CopyFiles.CopyTwo
member.summary: This method takes the Second 1/4 of fArray and fArrayDest and uses them to copy files.

member.name: M:MCopy.CopyFiles.CopyThree
member.summary: This method takes the Third 1/4 of fArray and fArrayDest and uses them to copy files.

member.name: M:MCopy.CopyFiles.CopyFour
member.summary: This method takes the forth 1/4 of fArray and fArrayDest and uses them to copy files.
